content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 2, Valencia 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 2, Valencia 0.
Foul by David Navarro (Valencia).
Shaun Wright-Phillips (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Joaquín (Valencia) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Substitution, Valencia. Paco Alcácer replaces Roberto Soldado.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ángel Dealbert.
Attempt blocked. Shaun Wright-Phillips (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Abdisalam Ibrahim.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Iván Rubio.
Goal!  Manchester City 2, Valencia 0. Jô (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Patrick Vieira.
Attempt saved. Éver Banega (Valencia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Shay Given.
Attempt saved. Pablo Hernández (Valencia) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Foul by Patrick Vieira (Manchester City).
Éver Banega (Valencia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Substitution, Valencia. Juan Mata replaces Tino Costa.
